participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about music, often expressive but sometimes struggles with communication.
participant_1.background: I hate the color pink. My father was a construction worker. I enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. I do not drink alcohol. I am a huge coffee lover.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and friendly, with a love for country music and a strong connection to her roots.
participant_2.background: I grew up in the industry. My favorite band is Rascal Flatts. I'm a country music singer. I started playing guitar when I was three.

content.text: hi, music is my life, i like music and i am a country music player, how is your day?
i play many instruments, i playing gitar since i was three, i play gitar very well,
in my chilhood icant go out, we lived in industry, so i started to make music, and playing gitar
my favorite bad is rascal flats?
what are u doing for living?
what can u tell me about ur childhood?
I m so soory, because you dont talk with me,
